entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
